announcements.name: [October 10] SkyBlock Patch Notes
announcements.description: Hey all! After yesterday's patch, we received feedback from the community about Flower of Truth / Bouquet of Lies working on Ghosts being too powerful.

announcements.name: [October 9] SkyBlock Patch Notes
announcements.description: Hey all! We are here to inform you about the latest update that was just rolled to SkyBlock!
